JoJoMod@TheCoroboCorner.readme:
# JoJo Mod

This is a mod that aims to add a lot of the different Stands from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.
Currently, there are *45* Jokers, *29* Consumables, *1* enhancement, and *1* sticker.

Textures are still incomplete for now, with most of them using placeholders, so please stay tuned for the future, and I hope you enjoy the mod!

# How to Install

You will require [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods) in order to use this mod. Instructions on [how to install Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki) are listed on their Github page.

Once that's installed, just unzip the file called "Release.zip" into your Mods folder, and you should be good to go!

(Oh, and this mod isn't compatible with the Incantation mod; it causes some issues with one of our Jokers. I'll try to fix that in the future, but for right now, if you have both, it won't work.)

Enjoy!

Maximus@the-Astra.description: Maximus is a Vanilla+ mod that strives to preserve the Vanilla feel of the game (for the most part, looking at you Nuclear deck) while innovating on newer ideas to keep things fresh! Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48
Maximus@the-Astra.readme:
![Banner](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fa66aa30-60b8-44f9-9d41-5a452ca08b49)
Maximus is a Vanilla+ mod that strives to preserve the Vanilla feel of the game (for the most part, looking at you Nuclear deck) while innovating on newer ideas to keep things fresh!

Maximus currently adds the following:
- 150 Jokers
- 6 Decks
- 15 Achievements
- 12 Horoscope Cards
- 3 Spectral Cards
- 11 Planet Cards
- 10 Boss Blinds
- 15 Challenges
- 8 Vouchers
- AND MORE!!!

### THIS MOD DEPENDS ON [3xCredits](https://github.com/AuroraKy/3xCredits)! Please ensure you install this mod too!!

### [Official Discord](https://discord.gg/GvCCcryM48)
Join to keep up to date with development, contributions, or just to chat with people who also enjoy the mod!

### [How to install](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)
Follow this guide and unzip the latest release of Maximus into the newly created "Mods" folder

versionHistory.name: v1.2.1
versionHistory.body:
## Additions
- 4 new Challenges (Feast Fit for a King, Coexist, Speedrun, and Greedy Bastard)
- A ton of winning/losing Quips
- Maximus now properly provides OneTooManyAPI

## Changes
- Changed all scaling methods to use SMODS' new method. Allows for cross-mod compatibility for features like Group Chat and Soil Joker
- Changed Nuclear deck from using custom code to the new SMODS Operator API. Allows for less conflicts with Nuclear Deck specifically (aka you can now use Nuke Deck with Cryptid)
- Spider Joker is no longer affected by chance modifiers
- Changed many challenges to use new challenge calculation methods for better reliability
- Changed some Horoscope tags to trigger using global mod calculate methods for better reliability
- Secret Society is no longer hardcoded and will change based on the highest and lowest ranks available
- Achievements can now be unlocked on Unlock All profiles

## Fixes
- Fixed Bones Jr being able to spawn as eternal
- Fixed a ton of Black Seal related issues
- Fixed Detective not flipping cards
- Fixed eggsplosion patch
- Fixed Aeon not having an info card for Footprint

## Installation
Unzip the `Maximus-main.zip` file in your `%Appdata%/Roaming/Balatro/mods` folder. This assumes you have already installed Steamodded. If you have not, then please follow the installation instructions for it [here.](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)

- 2 new Jokers (Boar Bank, Spider Joker)

- Changed Conveyor Belt timings so the values it adds do not get overwritten

# Grab Bag
Grab Bag is a Balatro mod that currently adds: 
- 46 (+8) Jokers
- 3 Tarots
- 1 Spectral
- 3 Enhancements 
- 15 Boss Blinds
- 5 Showdown Boss Blinds
- and 4 Decks.

The content in this mod is supposed to feel vanilla, and I created this new content to be largely in line with the rules and design philosophy that localthunk follows when making Jokers and other content. 

## Jokers

### Rare

## Enhancements

## Shattered Jokers

Lucky-Rabbit@Trif3ctal.readme:
# Lucky Rabbit
Lucky Rabbit is a WIP Vanilla+ Balatro mod that adds new Jokers, boss blinds, a new consumable type, and more to expand upon the base game, cooked up by [Fennex](https://www.twitch.tv/mrfennex), [Trif](https://github.com/Trif3ctal), and [HarmoniousJoker](https://github.com/HarmoniousJoker). Its time to get silly!

*Note: This mod requires [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded/archive/refs/heads/main.zip) and [Lovely](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector/releases/latest) (obviously)*

As of now, this mod adds:
- **42** fun new Jokers
- **23** new Silly consumable cards
- **3** brand-new card modifiers known as **Markings**
- **2** new Enhancements to expand your deck
- **15** upgraded and helpful Vouchers
- **5** practical Decks
- **4** skip-worthy Tags
- **11** tough new Boss Blinds
- **6** themed Friends of Jimbo-style card skins

__Feel free to check out [the in-depth mod progress spreadsheet!](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-gmJJKUTY5EP2TqhpfTXqD-P1NzQQxCRvEpoFnwK72g/edit?gid=1809378509#gid=1809378509)__

*Give us feedback or notify us of issues at [the official Balatro Discord thread!](https://discord.com/channels/1116389027176787968/1342484578236895274)*
-

CardSleeves@larswijn.name: Card Sleeves
author: Larswijn
CardSleeves@larswijn.description: Adds sleeves as modifier to decks.  See full description in-game by enabling mod or checking `descriptions.Mods.CardSleeves`.
CardSleeves@larswijn.readme:
# ![icon](assets/1x/icon.png) CardSleeves
A Steamodded+lovely Balatro Mod that adds Sleeves.

![Balatro_Card_Sleeves](Balatro_Card_Sleeves.png)

# Requirements
Requires `steamodded >= 1.0.0~ALPHA-1206c` - [link](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki).

Requires `Lovely >= 0.6.0` - [link](https://github.com/ethangreen-dev/lovely-injector). This should already be installed as part of steamodded's installation process.

# Installation
Get the latest stable version from the [Releases](https://github.com/larswijn/CardSleeves/releases/latest), then download and extract the zip.
Or use `git clone` for the latest development code, which is more up-to-date, but might be unstable.

Make sure to put the `CardSleeves` folder in the `Mods` directory, and that it is not nested.

# Features
Sleeves are run modifiers similar to decks. Any deck and sleeve can be combined.

CardSleeves adds 15 Sleeves by default, some of which have an unique and different effect when paired with their corresponding deck:
| Sleeve           | Base effect                                            | Unique effect                                                          |
|------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Red Sleeve       | +1 discard                                             | +1 discard, -1 hand                                                    |
| Blue Sleeve      | +1 hand                                                | +1 hand, -1 discard                                                    |
| Yellow Sleeve    | +$10                                                   | Seed Money Voucher                                                     |
| Green Sleeve     | +$1 per remaining hand/discard                         | Can go up to -$2 in debt for every hand and discard                    |
| Black Sleeve     | +1 joker slot, -1 hand                                 | +1 joker slot, -1 discard                                              |
| Magic Sleeve     | Crystal Ball Voucher, 2 Fools                          | Omen Globe Voucher                                                     |
| Nebula Sleeve    | Telescope Voucher, -1 consumable slot                  | Observatory Voucher                                                    |
| Ghost Sleeve     | Spectral cards appear in shop, Hex card                | Spectrals appear more often in shop, Spectral pack size increases by 2 |
| Abandoned Sleeve | No Face Cards in starting deck                         | Face Cards never appear                                                |
| Checkered Sleeve | 26 Spades and 26 Hearts in starting deck               | Only Spades and Hearts appear                                          |
| Zodiac Sleeve    | Tarot Merchant, Planet Merchant and Overstock Vouchers | Arcana/Celestial pack size increases by 2                              |
| Painted Sleeve   | +2 hand size, -1 joker slot                            | +1 card selection limit, -1 joker slot                                 |
| Anaglyph Sleeve  | Double Tag after each Boss Blind                       | Double Tag after each Small/Big Blind                                  |
| Plasma Sleeve    | Balance chips/mult, X2 base Blind size                 | Balance prices in shop                                                 |
| Erratic Sleeve   | All ranks/suits in starting deck are randomized        | Starting Hands/Discards/Dollars/Joker slots are randomized between 3-6 |

Other mods have the ability to add their own Sleeves! Some of these mods include:
+ [Cryptid](https://github.com/MathIsFun0/Cryptid)
+ [Familiar](https://github.com/RattlingSnow353/Familiar)
+ [SDM_0's Stuff](https://github.com/SDM0/SDM_0-s-Stuff)
+ [MoreFluff](https://github.com/notmario/MoreFluff)
+ [Reverie](https://github.com/dvrp0/reverie)
+ [Pokermon](https://github.com/InertSteak/Pokermon)
+ [Buffoonery](https://github.com/pinkmaggit-hub/Buffoonery)
+ [Balatro Drafting](https://github.com/spire-winder/Balatro-Draft)
+ [Themed Jokers](https://github.com/cerloCasa/Themed-Jokers)
+ [Jimbo's Pack](https://github.com/art-muncher/Jimbo-s-Pack)
+ And more!

CardSleeves also has support for [Galdur](https://github.com/Eremel/Galdur)'s improved new run menu!

# API (for mod developers)
Any other mod can create new sleeves. See [the wiki](https://github.com/larswijn/CardSleeves/wiki) for more information.

# Credits
Big thanks to Sable for the original idea and the original art, all the cool people who helped translate, and the amazing balatro modding community for helping out with the lua code.

Any suggestions, improvements or bugs are welcome and can be submitted through Github's Issues, or on the Balatro Discord [Thread](https://discord.com/channels/1116389027176787968/1279246553931976714).

versionHistory.name: V1.8.0
versionHistory.body:
* For other mods devs (also see [API changes](https://github.com/larswijn/CardSleeves/wiki/Sleeves-API-Changes)):
  * Deprecated `shop_final_pass` context for sleeves. As far I'm aware, no mod actually used this context.
  * Refactored `Sleeve:calculate` behind the scenes to use `SMODS.get_card_areas`.
* Mod compatibility for users:
  * Bumped minimum SMODS version to 1.0.0~ALPHA-1424a (feb 2025). You should already have this.
* Localization:
  *  German by @onichama.

versionHistory.name: V1.7.8
versionHistory.body:
* Bug fixes:
  * Fixes compat with recent [SMODS#582 deck preview pages](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/pull/582) in beta-0525b or later

versionHistory.name: V1.7.7
versionHistory.body:
* New changes in v1.7.7:
  * Added  Russian localization by @EnderDrag0n and Astryder in #15 
* Changes since v1.7.6:
  * Fixed the `modify_scoring_hand` context for other mod devs (requires SMODS 0521 or later)

versionHistory.name: V1.7.5
versionHistory.body:
- Localization:
  - Added  Polish by avandemortell2137

versionHistory.name: V1.7.4
versionHistory.body:
+ Bugfixes:
  + Fixes #13 (Gold Stake sticker visual issues)
  + Yellow sleeve now has the actual word "voucher" in its description
+ Localization:
  + Updates to zh_CN
+ Future-proofing:
  + Hopefully take https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/pull/626 into account

versionHistory.name: V1.7.3
versionHistory.body:
+ Added a new option for the config that visually stacks/compress the deck when cardsleeves is installed:
  + Always stack [default]
    + Always stacks the deck closer together.
  + When using sleeve
    + Stack the deck only when using a sleeve.
    + This is the new option, as requested by @fiiibee.
  + Never stack
    + Does not stack the cards. This could result in the sleeve being stretched, and cards visually being outside the sleeve.
    + Not recommended.

versionHistory.name: V1.7.2
versionHistory.body: * Hopefully fixed sleeves getting confused about the current deck when opening the new run menu while already in a run

versionHistory.name: V1.7.1
versionHistory.body:
* For other mods devs:
  * Sleeves now properly handle returning from the `destroy_card` context
  * Removed `Sleeve:get_name()`, since it did not respect `loc_vars` key change. As far I'm aware, no mod actually used this function
* Mod compatibility:
  * If you are using [VietnameseBalatro](https://github.com/HuyTheKiller/VietnameseBalatro), please update it to avoid conflicts
  * If you are using [SauKhongHuDecks](https://github.com/HuyTheKiller/SauKhongHuDecks), please update it to avoid conflicts
  * If you are using [MoreFluff](https://github.com/notmario/MoreFluff), please update it to avoid conflicts
* Localization:
  * Vietnamese by @HuyTheKiller

versionHistory.name: V1.6.9
versionHistory.body: - Fixed green sleeve description (effect remains unchanged)

versionHistory.name: V1.6.8
versionHistory.body:
* For other mods devs:
  * Sleeves can now retrigger jokers, similar to steamodded's [1.0.0~BETA-0309b](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/commit/41bd70adc3fe4664de0cbedd9489583535114494) version letting decks retrigger jokers
* Localization:
  * Green sleeve now has the exact same phrasing as green deck

versionHistory.name: V1.6.7
versionHistory.body:
* New changes in v1.6.7:
  * Other mods' collection -> other -> sleeves should now have better visible description pop-ups
* Bug fixes since v1.6.6:
  * Fixed a bug when using Galdur, it was possible for sleeves to think you were running a different deck
* Bug fixes since v1.6.5:
  * Fix stacked nebula deck + sleeve effect

versionHistory.name: V1.6.4
versionHistory.body:
* For other mods devs (also see [API changes](https://github.com/larswijn/CardSleeves/wiki/Sleeves-API-Changes)):
  * `Sleeve:get_name` has been deprecated. Use `Sleeve:generate_ui` instead. 
  * `:apply` now takes a `sleeve` argument (currently same as self). This should not require any code changes currently.
* Content:
  * Added red deck+sleeve unique effects
  * Added blue deck+sleeve unique effects
  * Added yellow deck+sleeve unique effects
  * Added painted deck+sleeve unique effects
* Bug fixes:
  * Automatically unlock sleeves without needing to win a run first
  * Sleeve sprite no longer gets stretched when moving around the top card of the deck
  * No more error messages in collection
  * Hopefully no more `attempt to index G.GAME.viewed_back` crashes
* Localization:
  * Added traditional Chinese (thanks to Mr Clover)

versionHistory.name: V1.6.3
versionHistory.body:
* New in v1.6.3:
  * Fixed sleeve description pop-up location in game over -> new run menu
  * Fixed crash when using Cryptid's refactor branch
* Since v1.6.1 and v1.6.2:
  * Updated mod description when mod is unloaded
  * Internal changes to use metadata json file by @therealbenpai in #10 
  * Safety checks in `check_for_unlock` as reported in #9

versionHistory.name: V1.6.0
versionHistory.body:
* API-relevant changes for other mod developers:
  * If you use unlock conditions for sleeves, and it's the default "win on X deck with Y stake", you should change from stake index to stake key. See [this page](<https://github.com/larswijn/CardSleeves/wiki/Sleeves-API-Changes#v160>) for more information.
  * Sleeves now support `:calculate`. No worries if your sleeve still uses `:trigger_effect`, as I'll probably support it as long as steamodded is too.
* General changes:
  * Sleeves will now show up in other mods' Additions -> Other, as suggested by @dimserene 
  * Plasma deck + plasma sleeve now has a neat little animation for balancing the prices in the shop!
  * The in-game mod description now uses localization for some fancy effects and better readability
  * Changed CardSleeves priority `-1` -> `-10` for compatability with Gemstones
  * Bumped min steamodded version to `1.0.0~ALPHA-1206c`, and set min lovely version to `0.6.0`
* Localization:
  * Portuguese (BR) by @pinkmaggit-hub in #6, appreciate it!
* Bugfixes:
  * Plasma deck + plasma sleeve no longer balances the score twice (visual bug only)

versionHistory.name: V1.5.5
versionHistory.body:
- Steamodded compatibility change for vouchers loading (see #7) (steamodded version 1321c or higher)
- For other mod developers: finally removed `get_current_deck_name`

versionHistory.name: V1.5.4
versionHistory.body: * Bugfix: playing cards from other mods should now work properly when using the abandoned deck + sleeve combo

versionHistory.name: V1.5.3
versionHistory.body:
- Bug fixes:
  - (Galdur only) Last run button no longer changes its sleeve when selecting one without starting a run
- Localization: 
  - Changed some hard-coded strings to use localization instead
- UI: 
  - Better alignment of sleeve select with stake select in new run menu
  - Sleeve info in deck select and run info should look a bit nicer

versionHistory.name: V1.5.2
versionHistory.body:
- Fixed possible crash when switching between selecting sleeves <-> selecting deck (galdur only)
- Fixed possible crash when highlighting locked sleeves on a brand new profile

versionHistory.name: V1.5.1
versionHistory.body: + Compatibility with the latest version of steamodded ALPHA-1306a, also known as "better-calc 2.0".

versionHistory.name: V1.5.0
versionHistory.body:
+ Sprite-sheet changes (for other mod developers):
  + Sleeve sprites should be changed to have a 1px border on both sides to prevent sprite bleeding
+ General fixes:
  + Fixed sleeve sprite bleeding (no more weird green edge flicker)
+ Galdur-related changes:
  + Added controller support
  + Fixed bug where it was possible to bypass the unique effect check
  + Fixed memory leak when switching between sleeve pages
  + Fixed tooltips from appearing on locked sleeves by @jumbocarrot0 
  + Fixed unlock description of locked sleeves to properly use "???" when it includes an unknown deck to the player by @jumbocarrot0 

Big thanks to @jumbocarrot0 for helping out with most of these changes!

versionHistory.name: V1.4.8
versionHistory.body: - Fix mod incompatibility (Cryptid+Galdur) editioned decks issue (only with lovely 0.6.0 or later)

versionHistory.name: V1.4.7
versionHistory.body:
+ Localization! Big thanks to all the people that helped me translate text into other languages!
  + Chinese by Mr Clover
  + Spanish by Batolol
  + French by Miser
+ Added incompatibility with 2 month (before 13 Sep 2024) or older versions of grim<=0.9.5 due to it breaking sleeve unlocks

versionHistory.name: V1.4.6
versionHistory.body:

+ Fix Cryptid misprint deck compatibility issue (only with lovely 0.6.0 or later)

versionHistory.name: V1.4.5
versionHistory.body:
- If you were using Galdur, make sure to update it to [v1.1.4](https://github.com/Eremel/Galdur/releases/latest)!

- Fixed sleeves vibrating on selection

versionHistory.name: V1.4.4
versionHistory.body: + Fix regression with plasma sleeve's unique effect

versionHistory.name: V1.4.3
versionHistory.body:
+ Added a config option for where to show sleeve information (name + description), with 4 options:
  + Only in deck view  [default]
    + No space for sleeve sprite/mod badges
    + Also condenses the suit counter from 2x2 to 4x1 for space
  + Only in run info
    + Still has sleeve sprite/mod badges
  + Show in both
    + Sleeve info shows up in either menu for the best of both worlds
  + Hide sleeve info
    + Hides it in both menus for the minimalists

+ Fix issue with the random sleeve button when having both locked and modded sleeves

versionHistory.name: V1.4.2
versionHistory.body: + Fix HouseRules incompatibility issue

versionHistory.name: V1.4.1
versionHistory.body:
+ API-relevant changes (for developers):
  + DEPRECATION: use `CardSleeves.Sleeve.get_current_deck_key()` now for deck comparisons instead of `CardSleeves.Sleeve.get_current_deck_name()`
  + Sleeves can now be locked (using `unlocked`, `unlock_condition`, and optionally `check_for_unlock`, `locked_loc_vars`)
  + Challenges now support the `sleeve` argument (if that's something someone wants?) - still in a beta version and might have issues/bugs

+ Content changes:
  + Sleeves are now in the collection and the CardSleeves additions tab! Find them under collection/additions -> other -> sleeves
  + Sleeves now have stickers to show the highest stake you've won with them!
  + Sleeves now have badges to show which mod(s) they're from!
  + Base-game sleeves are now locked by default, and get unlocked by winning on their corresponding deck and a minimum stake
  + Added mod config option to ignore all sleeve unlock conditions. Also added a description to all config options.

+ Multiple bug fixes
  + Sleeves no longer get applied in challenges that do not define a sleeve
  + Sleeve badges now respect Steamodded no badges config option
  + Sleeve alignment now looks better when adjust deck alignment config is disabled
  + Galdur: Last run's sleeve now persists through restarting the game

JokerDisplay@nh6574.name: JokerDisplay
author: nh6574
JokerDisplay@nh6574.description: Display useful information under Jokers. Controls: Right-click or B - hide/show. Left-click or Up - collapse/expand.
JokerDisplay@nh6574.readme: # JokerDisplay for Balatro Balatro mod that displays information such as modifiers or relevant hands, ranks or suits under Jokers. ## Installation 1. Install [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamopollys/Steamodded) [(version >1.0.0)](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki) 2. Download the [latest release](https://github.com/nh6574/JokerDisplay/releases) 3. Extract the zip file into its own folder inside your Balatro mods folder (%appdata%\Balatro\Mods) ## Usage * Right-click the display or a Joker to hide/unhide displays (or use the back button on your controller over a Joker). This will disable all calculations for that joker (in case of crashes). * Left-click the display to collapse/expand extra rows of text. (or use the up button on your controller over a Joker). * Go to Mods > JokerDisplay > Config for more options. Feel free to [open an issue](https://github.com/nh6574/JokerDisplay/issues) for suggestions or bug reports. ## Screenshots ## Mod Support This mod only supports vanilla jokers but you can add support for it in your own mod by defining how the display should look. Check out the [wiki](https://github.com/nh6574/JokerDisplay/wiki) for API documentation. | Mods with JokerDisplay support | | |---|---| | [Aikoyori's Shenanigans](https://github.com/Aikoyori/Balatro-Aikoyoris-Shenanigans) | [Baladrone](https://github.com/fantasygone/Baladrone) | | [BalatroOlympus](https://github.com/lshtech/BalatroOlympus) | [Balatro Multiplayer](https://github.com/Balatro-Multiplayer/BalatroMultiplayer) | | [Betmma Jokers](https://github.com/betmma/my_balatro_mods) | [Bird Jokers](https://github.com/JustinBanzon/Bird-Jokers) | | [Boss Jokers](https://github.com/KilledByLava/BossJokers) | [Bunco](https://github.com/Firch/Bunco) | | [Cryptid](https://github.com/MathIsFun0/Cryptid) | [D6-Jokers](https://github.com/GauntletGames-2086/D6-Jokers) | | [Diceylatro](https://nriomoder.itch.io/diceylatro) | [Emporium](https://github.com/krokshut/Emporium) | | [Friends Vs. Balatro](https://github.com/rae-vyn/FriendsVsBalatro/tree/main) | [Inscrybed Jokers](https://github.com/LunaAstraCassiopeia/LunasBalatroMods) | | [Jank Jonklers](https://github.com/spikeof2010/JankJonklers) | [Joker Evolution](https://github.com/SDM0/Joker-Evolution) | | [JamMod](https://github.com/WilsontheWolf/JamMod) | [Lobotomy Corporation](https://github.com/Mysthaps/LobotomyCorp) | | [Pampa Joker Pack](https://github.com/lshtech/balatro-pampa-joker-pack) | [Redux Arcanum](https://github.com/jumbocarrot0/Redux-Arcanum) | | [Reverie](https://github.com/dvrp0/reverie/tree/main) | [Revo's Vault](https://github.com/Cdrvo/Revos-Vault---Balatro-Mod/tree/main) | | [SDM_0's Stuff](https://github.com/SDM0/SDM_0-s-Stuff/) | [Snow-s-Mods](https://github.com/RattlingSnow353/Snow-s-Mods) | | [SpicyJokers](https://github.com/RitchieDimaria/SpicyJokers) | [The World Ends With Jimbo](https://github.com/parchmentEngineer/The-World-Ends-With-Jimbo) | | [Valkyrie](https://github.com/dainekoichi/Valkyrie-BalatroMod) | | ## Contributing This mod will probably not get any new features after 1.8, so please feel free to fork or do PRs if you feel like you can improve on this or fix any issues! Also I would appreciate if people contact me when there are updates to the game or Steamodded that break any features or add content. ### Acknowledgements Special thanks to Eremel and OppositeWolf770 for the help! And thank you to WholeHorse for the Russian localization and SDM0 for the French localization! ## Contact If you have any issues feel free to contact me on [Twitter](https://nh6574.com/), [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/nh6574.com) or Discord as nh6574 And here's my [ko-fi link](https://ko-fi.com/nh6574) if you feel especially grateful.

# JoyousSpring - Balatro Mod Adds modern Yu-Gi-Oh! cards and mechanics. ## Installation 1. Extract the zip file into its own folder inside your Balatro mods folder (%appdata%\Balatro\Mods) Make sure to check the Glossary and the Config in Main Menu > Mods > JoyousSpring Has compatibility with [JokerDisplay](https://github.com/nh6574/JokerDisplay) version >1.8.2 Check out the [Discord](https://discord.gg/Ac5FKpQCRV) for troubleshooting and chatting about the mod <3 ## Known Issues and future ideas - Still very much WIP - Extra Deck and summon material selection doesn't work properly with a controller - It hasn't been tested with other mods (other than JokerDisplay) so it might not play well with them ## Screenshots ## Currently implemented ||||||| |--|--|--|--|--|--| |

versionHistory.body:
## What's Changed
This update requires [SMODS~BETA-0827b or higher](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/releases/latest)

v0.8.5.4:
* Fix crash when calculating excavations at end of run

v0.8.5.3:

* Fixes cardarea styling in newer SMODS.

v0.8.5.2:

* Fixed Spright Sprind's crash

v0.8.5:
* Small fixes
* Updated French localization

v0.8.4.3:
* Added JokerDisplay support for Fortune Ladies and Free Agents

v0.8.4.2:
* Some tooltips have been added or rewritten

v0.8.4.1:
* Cardian Synchros and Fortune Lady Every can be summoned without space
* Fix Super Koi Koi not working with Telescope
* Fix cards that add to the Extra Deck when used as material counting the summoned cards when checking for room

v0.8.4:
* Added Linkslayer @ Ignister, Linkslayer and Code Igniter
* Added alt arts (check config) and updated some cards that were using scans
* Added text when trying to summon an extra deck joker without space

### Installation
* Install/update [Steamodded](https://github.com/Steamodded/smods/wiki)
* Delete your previous JoyousSpring files if any
* Download "Source Code (zip)" and unzip it into a folder inside your Balatro mods folder (%appdata%\Balatro\Mods)

# Recommended mods:
## Mods with native support:
* [JokerDisplay](https://github.com/nh6574/JokerDisplay) - Adds information under Jokers so you don't have to hover them. This mod adds native support.
* [TheFamily](https://github.com/SleepyG11/TheFamilyBalatro) - Adds extra tabs to the side to save space on the screen. This mod adds native support (might add exclusive features in the future so it's recommended)
* [CardSleeves](https://github.com/larswijn/CardSleeves) - Adds sleeves to decks for extra effects. This mod adds some.
* [Handy](https://github.com/SleepyG11/HandyBalatro) - Adds QoL controls to the game. This mods supports some features natively.
* [Unjankify](https://github.com/blazingulag/Unjankify) - Fixes some issues when playing with multiple mods like cardarea overlap. Includes JoyousSpring support.

## Other mods:
* [Galdur](https://github.com/Eremel/Galdur) - Nicer deck selection (Highly Recommended)
* [Glue](https://github.com/icyethics/Glue-For-Modpacks) - Utility to change shop slots, joker and consumable slots and rates
* [Cartomancer](https://github.com/stupxd/Cartomancer) - Includes functionalities to help in runs with lots of cards either in the Joker area or Deck, alongside other QoL features
* [Overflow](https://github.com/lord-ruby/Overflow) - Stacks consumables
* [Banner](https://github.com/SylviBlossom/Banner) - Ban objects from appearing in a run
* [Better Tags](https://github.com/WaffleDevs/BetterTags) - Stacks Tags
* [DebugPlus](https://github.com/WilsontheWolf/DebugPlus) - Debug/Cheating tools. Useful even if you're not a developer to bypass crashes or give yourself some items to test
